article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for GSI-OpenSSH
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating GSI-OpenSSH from GT2
section.para: No special procedures are required for GSI-OpenSSH installations migrating from GT2 to GT4. GSI-OpenSSH is backward compatible.

section.title: Migrating GSI-OpenSSH from GT3
section.para: No special procedures are required for GSI-OpenSSH installations migrating from GT3 to GT4. GSI-OpenSSH is backward compatible.
